statements: SELECT * FROM dance_team_routines;
SELECT routine_id, routine_name FROM dance_team_routines ORDER BY routine_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dance_team_routines WHERE formation_id = 2;
SELECT routine_name, formation_id FROM dance_team_routines WHERE music_playlist_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(routine_id) AS total_routines FROM dance_team_routines;
SELECT * FROM dance_team_routines WHERE formation_id = 1;
SELECT routine_name, formation_id FROM dance_team_routines WHERE routine_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM dance_team_routines WHERE routine_id IN (1, 2, 5) ORDER BY routine_name DESC;
SELECT routine_id, routine_name FROM dance_team_routines WHERE formation_id IS NOT NULL AND music_playlist_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT routine_name FROM dance_team_routines WHERE formation_id = 3 AND music_playlist_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines;
SELECT routine_id, routine_name FROM dance_routines WHERE formation_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT routine_name, formation_id FROM dance_routines WHERE playlist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM formations WHERE dancer_count > 5 ORDER BY formation_name DESC;
SELECT formation_name, dancer_count FROM formations WHERE routine_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines;
SELECT routine_name, formation_id FROM dance_routines WHERE routine_id = 123;
SELECT formation_name, dancer_count FROM formations WHERE formation_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY formation_name DESC;
SELECT routine_name, dancer_count FROM dance_routines JOIN formations ON dance_routines.formation_id = formations.formation_id WHERE dancer_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines WHERE playlist_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM dance_team_routines;
SELECT routine_name, choreographer FROM dance_team_routines WHERE difficulty_level='Intermediate';
SELECT formation_name, formation_type, num_dancers FROM formations ORDER BY num_dancers DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM music_playlists WHERE num_songs > 10 ORDER BY playlist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM formations WHERE formation_type='Circle' OR formation_type='Line' ORDER BY formation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dance_team_routines;
SELECT routine_name, difficulty_level, choreographer FROM dance_team_routines WHERE difficulty_level='Intermediate';
SELECT formation_name, num_dancers FROM formations WHERE formation_type='Circle' ORDER BY num_dancers DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM music_playlists WHERE num_songs > 20 ORDER BY playlist_name ASC;

SELECT routine_name, choreographer, routine_description FROM dance_team_routines WHERE choreographer='Alice' UNION ALL SELECT formation_name, formation_type, formation_description FROM formations WHERE formation_type='Line';
SELECT * FROM dance_routines;
SELECT routine_id, routine_name FROM dance_routines ORDER BY routine_id DESC;
SELECT formation_name, formation_description FROM formations WHERE formation_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE music_genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY playlist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM routine_steps WHERE step_order BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines;
SELECT routine_name, formation_name, playlist_name FROM dance_routines dr INNER JOIN formations fo ON dr.formation_id = fo.formation_id INNER JOIN playlists pl ON dr.playlist_id = pl.playlist_id;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines WHERE formation_id = 2;

SELECT routine_name, formation_name, playlist_name FROM dance_routines dr INNER JOIN formations fo ON dr.formation_id = fo.formation_id INNER JOIN playlists pl ON dr.playlist_id = pl.playlist_id ORDER BY dr.routine_name DESC;
SELECT dr.routine_name, COUNT(rs.step_id) AS total_steps FROM dance_routines dr LEFT JOIN routine_steps rs ON dr.routine_id = rs.routine_id GROUP BY dr.routine_id HAVING total_steps > 5;
SELECT * FROM DanceTeams;
SELECT team_name, team_captain FROM DanceTeams;
SELECT routine_name, choreographer FROM Routines WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT formation_name FROM Formations WHERE routine_id = 2;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM Songs ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_captain FROM DanceTeams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, routine_name, song_title FROM Playlists INNER JOIN Routines ON Playlists.routine_id = Routines.routine_id INNER JOIN Songs ON Routines.routine_id = Songs.song_id;
SELECT * FROM Formations WHERE routine_id = 3 ORDER BY formation_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(routine_id) AS total_routines FROM DanceTeams LEFT JOIN Routines ON DanceTeams.team_id = Routines.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, SUM(routine_id) AS total_routine_ids FROM DanceTeams INNER JOIN Routines ON DanceTeams.team_id = Routines.team_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_routine_ids DESC;
